summary: This bill, the 'Orderly Liquidation of the Department of Education Act', aims to terminate the Department of Education by October 1, 2026. It establishes an Office of Education within the Department of Health and Human Services and mandates a liquidation plan from the President. The bill transfers various education functions to other federal agencies like the Department of Health and Human Services, National Science Foundation, Department of Interior, Department of Treasury, Department of Defense, and Department of Labor. It also terminates certain education funds and restricts the making of Federal Direct PLUS Loans.
